title: United States Private Debt to GDP
description: Private Debt to GDP in the United States decreased to 221.60 percent in 2021 from 233.60 percent in 2020. Private Debt to GDP in the United States averaged 207.26 percent from 1995 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 233.60 percent in 2020 and a record low of 165.10 percent in 1995. Private sector debt to GDP measures the indebtedness of both sectors, non-financial corporations and households and non-profit institutions serving households, as a percentage of GDP.
author: OECD
